item.title: SAMM assessment tools
item.description: Links to info and tools If you want to learn more about SAMM assessments, we have a dedicated assessment page for that. If you’re just looking for the links to our spreadsheets or online assessment, here they are. Spreadsheets We have 2 versions of the SAMM Toolbox, a Microsoft Excel Toolbox and a Google Spreadsheet Toolbox . Online assessment SAMMwise is part of the official SAMM toolset and allows you to self-host an online assessment tool.
